Pharaohs & Pyramids | Viking River Cruises | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Pharaohs & Pyramids 12 Days | Cairo Roundtrip Includes FREE return flights up to AU$2,500* pp or receive a AU$2,500* pp discount in lieu of flights Available on 2026 & 2027 sailings Deal Details Travel Dates Jan-Jun & Aug- Dec 2026 Jan-Dec 2027 Sale Ends Dec 1, 2025 Priced From AUD10,595 per person Enquire Now Includes FREE return flights up to AU$2,500* pp or receive a AU$2,500* pp discount in lieu of flights Available on 2026 & 2027 sailings Description Discover the wonders of ancient Egypt on a journey that blends iconic landmarks with rich cultural experiences. Begin in Cairo, exploring the Great Pyramid, the Sphinx, and the Grand Egyptian Museum. Then sail the Nile in style, visiting legendary sites like Luxor’s temples, the Valley of the Kings, and the stunning Temple of Horus at Edfu. Along the way, explore vibrant markets, sacred temples, and traditional villages. With expert guides and comfortable accommodations, this cruise offers a deep, immersive look into one of history’s greatest civilizations. Highlights The Great Pyramid & Sphinx (Giza) Stand before two of the most iconic monuments of the ancient world—testaments to Egypt’s incredible engineering and enduring mystery. The Grand Egyptian Museum (Cairo) Explore the world’s largest collection of ancient Egyptian artifacts, including treasures from Tutankhamun’s tomb. Valley of the Kings & Queen Nefertari’s Tomb (Luxor) Descend into the richly decorated tombs of Egypt’s pharaohs, including the breathtakingly preserved tomb of Queen Nefertari. Temples of Karnak & Luxor Walk through massive halls lined with towering columns and hieroglyphs in two of Egypt’s most magnificent temple complexes. Temple of Horus (Edfu) Visit one of the best-preserved temples in all of Egypt, dedicated to the falcon god Horus and rich with ancient symbolism. Pricing Standard Stateroom (Cat B) from AU$10,595* per person twin share Pricing based on 11 June 2026 departure What's Included One complimentary shore excursion in every port of call Free Wi-Fi (connection speed may vary) All onboard meals, featuring regional specialties & always available classics Beer, wine & soft drinks with onboard lunch & dinner 24-hour specialty coffees, teas & bottled water Port taxes & fees Ground transfers with Viking Air purchase Visits to UNESCO Sites Enrichment lectures & Destination Performances Onboard gratuities Itinerary Day 1 Cairo, Egypt Day 2 Cairo, Egypt Day 3 Cairo, Egypt Day 4 Luxor, Egypt Day 5 Qena, Egypt Day 6 luxor, Egypt Day 7 Esna, Egypt Day 8 Aswan, Egypt Day 9 Aswan, - Kom Ombo, Egypt Day 10 Edfu - Luxor, Egypt Day 11 Cairo, Egypt Day 12 Cairo, Egypt Your Ship: Aboard a Viking Egypt Ship Designed specifically to navigate the majestic Nile River, our state-of-the-art fleet of identical sister ships combines understated elegance with seamless functionality. Built with clean lines and minimalist Scandinavian design principles, each vessel offers a serene and sophisticated atmosphere. Thoughtfully crafted to enhance your journey, these ships provide modern comfort and panoramic views, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in the timeless beauty of Egypt’s iconic landscapes and ancient treasures. Terms & Conditions Prices are per person, in Australian dollars and for Australian and New Zealand residents only. They are based on double occupancy and correct at time of printing. Prices include all advertised discounts, and all offers are subject to availability and may be withdrawn at any time. All offers are only valid for new bookings and only on selected departures made between 02 September - 01 December 2025 at 7PM (AEDT) unless sold out prior. A partially refundable deposit of AU$1,000 per person (in the form of a future cruise voucher less an AU$100 cancellation fee) is required to secure a confirmed reservation within 3 days of booking otherwise reservation may automatically cancel. Once deposit payment has been made, standard cancellation penalties apply. When booking airfares through Viking (including when taking advantage of a special offer that includes air travel), standard airline cancellation fees also apply. Displayed prices indicate the lowest available pricing across all available sailings from 2025 to 2028 and may have different offers applicable from those advertised for the promoted sailing years. Pricing for each itinerary can vary at short notice as availability changes and sailings close for the current season. Complete terms and conditions may be found in the Passenger Ticket Contract.Fly Free Economy Flights up to the value of AU$2,500pp when booking flights with Viking. Fly Free is economy flight(s) for both guests up to the value of AU$2,500 per person (pp) to/from Australia/New Zealand. If the flight cost exceeds AU$2,500pp the guest will cover the difference. If flights are cheaper than AU$2,500pp the unused portion of the air funds will be waived and cannot be transferred towards any other portion of the booking or any other person. A guest can use the AU$2,500pp to instead upgrade to business class or premium economy (booked through Viking) with AU$2,500pp off the buisness/premium economy airfare and the difference to be covered by the guest. Upgrade flight cost difference is to be paid at the time of flight booking. Any flight cost difference is to be paid at the time of flight booking. Applicable if flights are booked through Viking and must be booked in conjunction with a selected 2026/2027/2028 Viking River cruise. Flights are Viking’s choice of airline for selected major gateways in NZ: AKL/CHC/WLG. Guest must return their air form to Viking within 14 business days of receiving request for flights, otherwise Viking reserve the right to remove the free air promo and apply the respective in lieu of flights discount. Valid on bookings made between 02 September - 01 December 2025 at 7PM (AEDT). Guest may not request to change to flights included promotion post campaign end date of 01 December 2025. Viking will reach out to you or your travel advisor once flights are in the date range, at this point you may nominate your preferred departure/arrival dates. Both guests must be on the same airline booking (PNR) and fly together in both directions. Solo guests for River can use up to AU$5,000 towards their flights. Any unused portion of the air funds will be waived and cannot be transferred towards any other portion of the booking or any other person or booking. Please use code FFR25 to activate the Fly Free offer when booking online or via the Contact Centre. If no code is selected when booking via online, the Fly Free offer will be applied. Save AU$2,500pp and book flights independently. Guests are eligible to get a discount of AU$2,500 per person (pp) off the cruise fare at the time of booking in lieu of the Free Economy Class flights. Solo guests for River are eligible to get a discount of AU$5,000 per booking off the cruise fare in lieu of the free flights. Guests book their own flights independently of Viking. Valid on bookings made between 02 September - 01 December 2025 at 7PM (AEDT).Guest may not request to change to flights included promotion post campaign end date of 01 December 2025. Please use code CRD25 to activate the In Lieu of Flights offer when booking online or via the Contact Centre.If no code is selected when booking via online, the Fly Free offer will be applied. CRUISE ONLY OFFER - SAVE UP TO 30% on selected Viking 2025 River Voyages Applies to any new booking made between 02 September - 01 December 2025 at 7PM AEDT on a 2025 Viking River voyage. Professional service fees may apply. Experience the world differently.
